Settings.Title: Settings for your day care
Settings.Help: Select YES/NO buttons below and Click Save to update settings
Settings.OwnTemplateQuestion: I will create my own template for Kids Daily Report and Activities.
Settings.OwnTemplateHelp: You can create a custom template from Kids page if this is checked
Settings.GigTemplateQuestion: I will use GigglesWare provided Report for Kids Daily Report and Activities.
Settings.GigTemplateHelp: This is selected by default. If you want a custom template, please say yes to above question
Settings.PromoteQues: Do you want us to promote your daycare?
Settings.PromoteQuesHelp: We will list your daycare on our website
